<h3 id="X652">X(652) = CROSSDIFFERENCE OF X(1) AND X(4)</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; sec B - sec C : sec C - sec A : sec A - sec B
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a (b - c) (b + c - a) (b^2 + c^2 - a^2) : :
<br >
Barycentrics&nbsp;&nbsp;sin A (sec B - sec C) : sin B (sec C - sec A) : sin C (sec A - sec B)
<b><br>
X(652) = 2 X[3064] - 3 X[14400], X[8611] - 3 X[14418], 4 X[14331] - 3 X[14400]<br>
</b>
<p>
X(652) is the perspector of triangle ABC and the tangential triangle of the conic that passes through the points A, B, C, X(1), and X(3).         (Randy Hutson, 9/23/2011)
</p>
<p>
X(652) lies on these lines: {6, 2432}, {9, 3239}, {19, 42755}, {31, 21122}, {44, 513}, {55, 4105}, {57, 7658}, {63, 4025}, {73, 9240}, {101, 2149}, {109, 7115}, {112, 2762}, {142, 25604}, {228, 22388}, {243, 522}, {333, 35519}, {514, 23726}, {520, 647}, {521, 8611}, {653, 2639}, {663, 1951}, {905, 4091}, {926, 8641}, {1769, 6591}, {2170, 35065}, {2260, 42768}, {2504, 21107}, {2523, 14395}, {2636, 9394}, {2654, 2657}, {2655, 21173}, {3101, 20298}, {3215, 14825}, {3217, 27780}, {3219, 25259}, {3835, 28834}, {3928, 44551}, {4131, 24562}, {4382, 40166}, {4498, 21120}, {4524, 6139}, {4814, 42657}, {4885, 25924}, {4976, 6362}, {5075, 23655}, {5227, 9031}, {5271, 17894}, {6332, 15411}, {6608, 11934}, {7082, 23615}, {7117, 39006}, {7180, 20980}, {9029, 23865}, {10319, 20319}, {14330, 28589}, {16612, 21189}, {17094, 23727}, {17215, 25511}, {17975, 23146}, {20316, 26080}, {20760, 23093}, {22382, 23226}, {23090, 23189}, {25955, 31287}, {26049, 26652}, {26694, 27139}, {27527, 28960}, {32674, 36040}, {34591, 38344}, {35072, 38353}, {38983, 39687}, {38991, 43960}, {43060, 43924}
</p>
<p>
X(652) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {663, 21789}, {3064, 14331}, {23727, 17094}<br>
X(652) = isogonal conjugate of X(653)<br>
X(652) = X(i)-Ceva conjugate of X(j)  for these (i,j): (2,38983), (101,48), (109,55)<br>
X(652) = crosspoint of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): (9,101), (109, 222)<br>
X(652) = crosssum of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): (1,652), (57,514), (65,650), (281,522), (513,1108)<br>
X(652) = crossdifference of every pair of points on line X(1)X(4)<br>
X(652) = trilinear pole of line {2637, 2638}<br>
X(652) = bicentric difference of PU(i) for i in (16, 76, 82, 126)<br>
X(652) = PU(16)-harmonic conjugate of X(73)<br>
X(652) = PU(76)-harmonic conjugate of X(2635)<br>
X(652) = PU(82)-harmonic conjugate of X(2654)<br>
X(652) = PU(126)-harmonic conjugate of X(4)<br>
X(652) = polar conjugate of isotomic conjugate of isogonal conjugate of X(36127)<br>
X(652) = trilinear product of PU(77)<br>
X(652) = trilinear pole of PU(77)<br>
X(652) = intersection of trilinear polars of X(1) and X(3)<br>
X(652) = trilinear product of circumcircle intercepts of line X(2)X(92)<br>
X(652) = X(31)-complementary conjugate of X(38983)<br>
X(652) = X(i)-Ceva conjugate of X(j) for these (i,j): {1, 2638}, {2, 38983}, {3, 3270}, {9, 34591}, {48, 38344}, {63, 7004}, {90, 2310}, {101, 48}, {109, 55}, {162, 14547}, {163, 2269}, {219, 7117}, {222, 1364}, {268, 35072}, {522, 663}, {651, 73}, {653, 1}, {658, 20277}, {823, 2654}, {905, 1459}, {906, 71}, {1020, 2646}, {1021, 650}, {1248, 42080}, {1331, 212}, {1332, 22072}, {1751, 11}, {1783, 22063}, {1813, 3}, {2762, 10535}, {3939, 7124}, {4558, 22361}, {4561, 20753}, {4563, 22421}, {4571, 2318}, {4574, 22074}, {4587, 219}, {7094, 38345}, {8059, 2188}, {8064, 1436}, {23067, 23207}, {23090, 36054}, {23189, 1946}, {36039, 672}, {36049, 6}, {36050, 42}, {36059, 40945}, {36093, 2356}, {37203, 35015}, {39943, 2170}, {39946, 3248}, {39947, 244}, {40117, 41087}, {40518, 40944}, {41206, 1936}<br>
X(652) = X(i)-cross conjugate of X(j) for these (i,j): {647, 650}, {822, 36054}, {1946, 1459}, {2638, 1}, {3270, 3}, {7117, 219}<br>
X(652) = cevapoint of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): {1, 2636}, {647, 822}<br>
X(652) = crosspoint of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): {1, 653}, {3, 1813}, {6, 32653}, {9, 101}, {21, 651}, {57, 8059}, {63, 1331}, {100, 40399}, {109, 222}, {190, 40436}, {219, 4587}, {268, 36049}, {333, 4636}, {521, 905}, {522, 6332}, {906, 2193}, {1021, 23090}, {1172, 40117}, {1812, 4571}<br>

X(652) = crossdifference of every pair of points on line {1, 4}<br>
